context.custom_context: Loneliness, waiting, phone calls, missing someone, hope and despair

verse_1: I'm walking alone down this street again
I've been here before, It's the same now as it was back then
I'm scrambling around trying to find my way
Knowing I can't hold on to yesterday
I just hope I make it through today
verse_2: The waves on the shore still call out your name
Your head on my shoulder still feels the same
If all was a lie baby you would still be true
But then I know this pictures missing you
I can't be sure I'm gonna make it through
chorus: But there's nobody home on the phone to talk to
Will somebody please give me a call I'm needing something new
I give you my words, you give me your time
You give me your smile while I sing you my rhyme
verse_3: It's getting harder to stay, each and every day, you're not here
But you make me stay, with the games you play, It's unclear
I'm saying where have you been, you say I'll be there by four
It's twenty to five, you're still not at my door
What can I do? I'm down on the floor
I'm waiting for you, but I can't take anymore.
bridge: I'm feeling further away, but you make me stay
What can I do, all I see is you
The beat of my heart tells me this is the start
Of something beautiful of something true
verse_4: Once more I'm feeling complete, standing back on my feet
Now I can see just where I want to be
Yesterday's pain won't defeat me again
I see a brand new day on the horizon
I see a brand new day on the horizon

signature_phrases: Brand new day on the horizon

mission_alignment.description: Longing for connection, community need, hope for new day
